audio_description: Welcome to Telugu Ruchi! On this channel, we show you various flavored rice recipes like biryani, pulao, fried rice, khichdi, and more. Today, let’s look at a traditional and tasty one.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Today, we’ll see how to make flavorful Thalassery Chicken Biryani. For the masala: 10g cinnamon, 5g cloves, 10g cardamom, 10g pepper, 5g black cumin, 5g fennel, 5g star anise.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: [No transcript; assumed silence or background action]
Also add: 15g cashews, 15g raisins, 75g onions, salt to taste, 2 bay leaves, 5g turmeric, half kg chicken, enough water, 50g tomatoes, 50g shallots.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: 75g curd, hot water as needed, 10ml oil, ½ kg Jeera Samba rice, 1g saffron, ghee as needed, 10ml lemon juice. To start, heat a pan and dry roast the cinnamon and cloves.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Add black cumin, fennel, star anise and roast lightly. Then add poppy seeds and roast briefly. Transfer to a plate and let cool.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Grind into a fine powder and set aside.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: In the same pan, add ginger, garlic, green chili, coriander, mint, and salt. Grind it into a smooth paste and keep it aside.

actions: Not specified
No cooking actions visible
Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: In a clay pot, heat ghee. Fry the cashews and raisins, and set them aside. Then fry onions.

actions: Not specified
No cooking actions visible
Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Add bay leaves and turmeric. Then add the earlier ground chicken masala paste.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Add chopped tomatoes, mix well, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Then add the chopped shallots.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Add the fried onions, the masala powder we made earlier, and curd. Mix thoroughly.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Cover and cook for 5 minutes, then set aside. In another clay pot, boil water with black cumin, salt, and oil.

actions: Not specified
No cooking actions visible
Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Add Jeera Samba rice. Cook till 70% done. Drain the rice completely.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Layer the cooked chicken masala at the bottom. Add lemon juice, saffron water, ghee. Cover and cook on dum (steam) for 15 minutes.

actions: Not applicable (the frames provided are introductory screens with no visible cooking actions)
No distinct cooking actions visible, just presentation of the dish
Serving biryani on a banana leaf
Presenting ingredients
Displaying spices

audio_description: Finally, garnish with the fried cashews, raisins, coriander, and onions. The delicious Thalassery Chicken Biryani is ready!
